column5: Anyone been to Brace Lake this year have a report. Going with my son in August. Any tips on types of bait and areas fished would be appreciated. Thanks for your help.

Don't worry, Kyle will put on fish. If you get to Meta , try the first long sandbar to the left. The fishing will be good in Brace. Just enjoy the trip. Hey maybe the lady pilot will fly you in. Have a good trip and will look forward to your report. OleJoe
